summary: Unit tests that verify the stochastic depth functionality within the Conformer encoder used for automatic speech recognition, checking both the forward computation behavior under different drop probabilities and the proper construction of models that incorporate stochastic depth.
business_intent: Ensure the correctness and robustness of the stochastic depth implementation in speech recognition models, reducing training variance and improving model performance by validating that the encoder behaves as expected under stochastic depth conditions.
